data.title: Leon Lai - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Leon Lai: his birthday, what he did before fame, his family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Hong Kong singer and actor who became on of the biggest names in Cantopop with singles like "After Loving You," "Charged Up" and "Sugar in the Marmalade." As an actor, he won the Golden Horse Award for Best Actor for his performance in 2002's Three: Going Home.

Before Fame

He migrated to Hong Kong during the Cultural Revolution in China as a child. He worked as a mobile phone salesman and participated in local singing contests.

Trivia

With the release of the 1998 single "After Loving You," he became the first Hong Kong singer to crack the Top 10 on the Korean Pop charts.

Family Life

He was married to Chinese fashion model and actress Gaile Lok from 2008 to 2012.

Associated With
